channel.title: Tag: weeknotes - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: 2025 Week 17
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: Another week, another weeknotes post. Talking about web components, Fastmail cleanup, garden irrigation, Revision 2025, and some other random crap! Someday, I'll figure out how to make these summaries more exciting!</body></html>

item.title: 2025 Week 16
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: Kicked off a new habit: jotting down bits and bobs throughout the week, then turning it into a blog post. Played with Meshtastic, roasted some coffee, fixed (and broke) Fossilizer, and started messing with garden irrigation. Just trying to get stuff out of my head and onto the web again.</body></html>
